name: dod, man
description:
A small Bitsy sketch for the Snail Jam. Kind of a weird mashup or two silly ideas which are 1) the title which inspired the dialogue and 2) snails and salt circles. It's surprisingly hard to keep two characters straight when they are just "dude" and "man".

Has some brief cussing.

made with:

Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
with help from Borksy by Ayolland 
using hacks by  mildmojo and Sean S. LeBlanc
and a bit of image to bitsy by ruin to make the last rooms
